nodes.name: Receive Support Issue
nodes.notes: Triggered when receiving a Gmail with Subject prefix: test support

parameters.subject: ={{ $('Receive Support Issue').item.json.Subject }}
parameters.message: =Thank you for contacting our support team!  We have received your message and created a support ticket for you. Ticket ID: {{ $('Receive Support Issue').item.json.id }}. Our team will respond to your inquiry within 24 hours.  Best regards, Customer Support Team

nodes.name: Send Verification Gmail
nodes.notes: Send verification Gmail to the user, in order to inform him that we received his ticket.

parameters.subject: =Re: {{ $('Receive Support Issue').all()[$itemIndex].json.Subject }}
parameters.bodyContent: =Thank you for contacting our support team! We have received your message and created a support ticket for you. Ticket ID: {{ $('Receive Support Issue').all()[$itemIndex].json.id }}. Our team will respond to your inquiry within 24 hours. Best regards, Customer Support Team

nodes.name: Send Verification Email
nodes.notes: Send verification Email to the user, in order to inform him that we received his ticket.

nodes.name: Cases
nodes.notes:
Group Issues to different categories:
a) Billing
b) Technical
c) Other

nodes.name: Billing Support Team
nodes.notes: Send a message on slack channel **1a-billing-issues** to inform the support team

nodes.name: Technical Support Team
nodes.notes: Send a message on slack channel **1b-technical-issues** to inform the support team

nodes.name: Other Support Team
nodes.notes: Send a message on slack channel **1c-other-issues** to inform the support team

nodes.name: Check if Sender IS NOT VIP Customer

parameters.subject: =Re: {{ $('Receive Support Issue').item.json.Subject }}
parameters.bodyContent:
=Dear {{ $json.Company }},
Thank you for contacting us! As a {{ $json['VIP Tier'] }} tier customer, 
you have access to our instant VIP support chatbot.

ü§ñ Chat instantly: https://www.chatbase.co/chatbot-iframe/RLmBFQ6DSjK3hMzRiZfGx
üìû Emergency line: +30 698 310 3833 
üë®‚Äçüíº Your Account Manager: {{ $json['Account Manager'] }}

We're here to help immediately!

nodes.name: Slackbot VIP Channel Request with Push Notifications
nodes.notes: Webhook call to Slack "VIP App chat-bot"

parameters.amount: ={{ $('Check if Sender IS NOT VIP Customer').item.json['SLA Hours'] * 50/100 * 60}}
={{ $('Check if Sender IS NOT VIP Customer').item.json['SLA Hours'] * 0.25 * 60 }}
={{ $('Check if Sender IS NOT VIP Customer').item.json['SLA Hours'] * 0.25 * 60 }}
